title: Why won't my phone recognize daylight savings time? I have it set to mirror network date/time.
content: It is set to use network date/time but it's not reflecting daylight savings time. I manually set it yesterday then after a few hours it showed daylight savings using the time I entered (so it was off by an additional hour). I switched it back to network time and it was fine until this morning, when it reverted back to pre daylight savings time.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
